opis: OKOLICA POREČA- prodaje se prekrasna vila površine 208 m2 s okućnicom površine 725 m2. Kuća se nalazi u lijepom mirnom naselju, udaljena 1.5 km od mora i 7 km od Poreča. Vila je završena u 2022. godini sa svim papirima I s uporabnom dozvolom. Gradnja je visoke kvalitete. Vila se sastoji od prizemlja I kata. U prizemlju se nalazi kuhinja, dnevni boravak, blagovaonica,wc za goste, tehnička soba, velika spavaća soba sa svojim kupatilom I stubište koje vodi na kat. Iz dnevnog boravka je izlaz na natkrivenu terasu gdje se nalazi ljetna kuhinja, lijepo uređeno dvorište, veliki bazen, sunčalište, te prostor za objedovanje I uživanje. Na katu se nalaze dvije spavaće sobe, svaka sa svojim kupatilom te izlaz na veliku terasu s prekrasnim pogledom na Alpe I more. Lijepo uređeno dvorište krase stare masline I živa ograda koja pruža potpunu privatnost u vlastitom prostoru. Ulaz u dvorište krase kameni stubovi i električni portun. Ima dva natkrivena parkirna mjesta. Kuća ima kolektore, toplinske pumpe, podno grijanje I solarne panele. Nalazi se u blizini svih sadržaja - restorana, trgovina, kampa Lanterne, u izgradnji je nova marina. --- POREČ SURROUNDINGS - a beautiful villa of 208 m2 with a garden of 725 m2 is for sale. The house is located in a beautiful, quiet village, 1.5 km from the sea and 7 km from Poreč. The villa was completed in 2022 with all the papers and a use permit. The construction is of high quality. The villa consists of a ground floor and an upper floor. The ground floor has a kitchen, living room, dining room, guest toilet, technical room, large bedroom with its own bathroom and a staircase leading to the upper floor. From the living room there is an exit to a covered terrace where there is a summer kitchen, a beautifully landscaped yard, a large swimming pool, a sunbathing area, and an area for dining and enjoying. On the upper floor there are two bedrooms, each with its own bathroom and an exit to a large terrace with a beautiful view of the Alps and the sea. The beautifully landscaped yard is decorated with old olive trees and a hedge that provides complete privacy in its own space. The entrance to the yard is decorated with stone pillars and an electric gate. It has two covered parking spaces. The house has collectors, heat pumps, underfloor heating and solar panels. It is located near all amenities - restaurants, shops, Lanterne camp, a new marina is under construction.
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
Alternativni izvori energije: Solarni paneli, Toplinske pumpe
